title: JSONify.link â€“ get a pages HTML data in JSON
author: khuknows
content: * login * api keyjsonify.linksubmit link get summary data the link json formatadd css selector get matched elements in json formattry outurl:css selector (optional): jsonify @ramykhuffash api key api docspost https://jsonify.link/api/0.1/ your auth token the following format: authorization: token [exampletoken] - replacing [exampletoken] your actual token. "url" is required the post you add optional "selector" just posting url summary data, "best" returns we consider best results the title, description, image, author. is fairly crudely done right , but does trick most web pages.curl examples: get general summary data a url:$curl -d '{"url":"https://techcrunch.com/2017/05/18/lucas-voncranach--ijad-madisch--speak--techcrunch-disrupt-berlin/"}' -h "content-type: application/json" -h "authorization: token [exampletoken]" -x post https://jsonify.link/api/0.1/{"all_paragraphs": ["\t\tyou are to activate facebook messenger news bot. once subscribed, bot send a digest trending stories once day. can customize types stories sends .\t", "\t\tclick the button below subscribe wait a facebook message the tc messenger news bot.\t", "disrupt is about most brilliant startups, entrepreneurs investors, disrupt berlin be exception. \u2019re delighted announce following speakers:", "latest headlines delivered you daily"], "article_paragraphs":
